nodes.text: Pliktu was a male Jawa who lived on Tatooine during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. He had a small shop in Anchorhead, located near the spaceport, where he sold starship components.

Pliku first appeared Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. He appears as a starship upgrade vendor in Anchorhead on Tatooine.
